General_Description: '''The Pre-Trial of Endurance''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra participated in the Trial of Endurance.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra approached a platform overlooking a pool of water, where the [[Pre-Trial Master of Endurance|trial master]] was waiting. *'''Pre-Trial Master of Endurance:''' ''Stay away, potential champion. You have too much to live for... Only spending a quite affordable amount of [[drachma]]e can save your soul!'' Kassandra approached her. *'''Pre-Trial Master of Endurance:''' ''I warn you—pay to pass this Trial, potential champion. The Trial of Endurance has seen more deaths than all the other Trials combined!'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Were the others drunk when they jumped?'' *'''Pre-Trial Master of Endurance:''' ''Actually, yes. Very unprofessional of them.
Should you survive the Champion's Dive, you'll need to retrieve my Trial Token from a chest in the [[Cave of Wealth|darkest depths]] of the water below.'' |-|Accept – I'll do your Trial.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Your Token will be mine.'' *'''Pre-Trial Master of Endurance:''' ''No, please, I urge you—''pay me'' for my Token. The watery dangers you must otherwise face to retrieve it are too great!'' (Accept – I'll do the Trial.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''You won't get one drachma from me. I'll do the Trial.'' *'''Pre-Trial Master of Endurance:''' ''If an excruciating underwater death is what you desire, who am I to stop you? Remember, you'll find my Token in a chest at the bottom of the lake.
I'll be waiting for you at the water's edge in the extremely unlikely event you survive.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''How exactly does going for a swim test my ability to slay the [[Minotaur]]?'' *'''Pre-Trial Master of Endurance:''' ''...Minotaurs work in mysterious ways?'' The trial master walked away. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Seems like a lot of hassle for a Token...'' Kassandra approached the edge of the platform and spotted several [[Great white shark|sharks]] in the waters below. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Looks like I'll have to get wet.'' Kassandra dove into the waters below and eliminated the sharks. After doing so, she dove further towards a cave, wherein she found a chest and looted its contents, including the token. |-|I'll pay. [1500]= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Just give me the malákas Token.'' *'''Pre-Trial Master of Endurance:''' ''Some might say you've paid to skip, others may call you an honorless coward... But know this: today you've invested in not dying. Excellent choice, champion.'' (If players talk to her again after the mission.) *'''Pre-Trial Master of Endurance:''' ''Don't lose your Token, champion! But if you do, I can give you a'' fantastic ''deal on a replacement.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra completed the Trial of Endurance, obtaining a token in the process.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
